title: solotype font- signet
content:
Hello

I came across this font... I think it is called Signet- by solotype?  
Does anyone know any more about this font? is there a digital version? or does anyone know where I could find a full character set...

Any info or links would be much appreciated.

Thanks  
-M

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080609231721im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/signet_5952.jpg)

 [‹ Mid-1800s Serifs](http://web.archive.org/web/20080609231721/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46179 "Go to previous forum topic") [Plantagenet relatives? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080609231721/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46156 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mmcgrath

comments.content:
Red Rooster’s [Amsterdam Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20080609231721/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/amsterdam-old-style-rr/light/charmap.html) is basically the same typeface. I notice that the M is different from the one shown in the Solotype Catalog, but I think the rest of the letters are the same.

- Mike Yanega
